title: Spooky Twig
summaries: The Spooky Twig is a Hardmode, post-Plantera crafting material used solely for crafting Spooky Wings. It has a chance to be dropped by Mourning Wood during the Pumpkin Moon event, with an increasing drop rate as waves progress.

statistics.Sell: 250

ingredients.value:
• [img:Soul of Flight]Soul of Flight (20)
  • [img:Spooky Twig]Spooky Twig
